name: Gemini Parallel Tools Concept (Node)
description: Conceptual notes for parallel tool responses using Gemini (SDK support may vary).

files.template:
# Gemini Parallel Tools (Concept)

- Define tool set: get_time, get_date.
- Ask model to decide which tool(s) to call.
- Process tool call results and send follow-up message.
- Aggregate responses.

Note: Parallel tool calls depend on SDK features; implement sequentially if unsupported.
